page.title: 08PENZANCE HARBOUR
page.content: Penzance Harbour has been gradually built over hundreds of years.The harbour in 1985 is very modern. A Harbour-master is in charge of the harbour,working with five other people.At one side of the harbour there is a dock.Built from the dock wall is a pier,at which the Isles of Scilly ferry,called the "Scillonian" waits.Also on this pier is a lighthouse.A road goes through part of the harbour,over a swing bridge called {Ross Bridge,}which opens so that ships can get to the dry dock which is at the back of the harbour.The Harbour-master has to make sure that the ships and boats are tied up and in no danger of drifting away,and that the harbour is repaired.Some unusual ships have come to the harbour,like Chinese junks,landing craft,salvage ships and mine-sweepers.
